Reference

Useful functions

Functions for listing and running lab tutorials.

run_lab()

Run a lab in your browser

show_labs()

List all available labs (tutorials)

Data sets

gbbakeoff

Great British bakeoff results

leaf

Properties of 340 leaves

lidar

Light detection and ranging

marbles

Race results from Jelle's Marble Runs

mobility

Economic mobility dataset

s301gradedist

S301 Grade Distributions

Other functions

Functions used in lectures or labs that may be useful.

Plot decision boundary for a classifier with 2 predictors
